title: Dolls (TEFC)
creator_credit: G.A. Howe, Pre-School Education Project and MacMillan Film Productions
brief_description: Indicates how realistic play with dolls helps children learn about human relationships and come to terms with babies in their own families. The class watches while a child’s mother washes and dresses her baby and the children copy her with their dolls.
creator_credit_for_label: G.A. Howe, Pre-School Education Project and MacMillan Film Productions
